price: 20. Kaadu baantá fuxsinteh (ugut baanta kinnuk), too ayró koros digaalah edde xagnisinte ayró.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
